mainBoard.name: Leonin Vanguard
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If you don't control three or more creatures as Leonin Vanguard's ability resolves, the ability does nothing. However, if you do control three or more creatures as it resolves, the +1/+1 bonus doesn't stop applying if you no longer control three creatures later in the turn.

If you don't control three or more creatures as your combat phase begins, Leonin Vanguard's ability won't trigger at all. Causing a permanent to become a creature during the beginning of combat step won't cause Leonin Vanguard's ability to trigger.

foreignData.text: El Castigo de Elspeth hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo. Si esa criatura fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.

mainBoard.name: Elspeth's Smite
mainBoard.originalText: Elspeth's Smite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Elspeth's Smite's replacement effect will exile the target creature or planeswalker if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage.

mainBoard.text: Elspeth's Smite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"There are lands beyond Valley. Wild, calamity-scarred, and beautiful."
—Farfeather, birdfolk scout

foreignData.flavorText:
« Il existe des terres par-delà Vallée. Sauvages, meurtries par la calamité, et magnifiques. »
—Plumeloin, éclaireur passerain
foreignData.name: Havre inexploré
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Es gibt Gebiete jenseits von Thal. Wild, von Unheil gezeichnet und wunderschön."
—Fernfeder, Späher des Vogelvolks
foreignData.name: Unerforschter Zufluchtsort
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Oltre la Valle ci sono altre terre. Selvagge, segnate dalle calamità e meravigliose."
—Lungapiuma, esploratore avianide
foreignData.name: Oasi Inesplorata
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText:
「渓間の向こうにも大地が広がっている。そこは荒れ果て、災厄の傷跡生々しく、美しい。」
――バードフォークの偵察員、遠羽
foreignData.name: 未知なる安息地
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Hay tierras más allá de Vallis. Salvajes, asoladas por la calamidad y bellas".
—Plumayente, exploradora pajarina
foreignData.name: Refugio inexplorado
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color.
{T}: Agrega un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Uncharted Haven
mainBoard.originalText:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

rulings.text: If Uncharted Haven is somehow on the battlefield without a chosen color, its mana ability won't make any mana.

mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
